document.full_text: antitrust law was inadequate to preserve the openness of the internet and to allow innovation to flourish, the top u.s. communications regulator said on thursday, defending internet road rules adopted last year.
document.title: fcc chief: antitrust law can't adequately defend internet
lines_and_colors: antitrust law was inadequate to preserve the openness of the internet and to allow innovation to flourish, the top u.s. communications regulator said on thursday, defending internet road rules adopted last year.
